events.message: The customer has reported a vehicle collision that occurred on March 30th, requesting to file a new auto accident claim.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating a car collision involving the insured vehicle.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the case and support the customer through the process.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming the receipt and initiation of the investigation for the auto accident claim.
The customer was requested to submit accident photos, police report, and vehicle damage assessment documents for verification.
Customer has submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos and the official police report for the vehicle collision.
The investigation into the auto accident claim began, with initial reviews scheduled for the vehicle damage and liability details.
Investigation concluded successfully, confirming the extent of damage and validating the claim according to policy coverage.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the claimant covering vehicle repairs and related expenses based on the investigation.
The customer responded positively to the settlement terms and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim.
Formal approval of the auto accident claim was issued following the customer’s acceptance of the settlement proposal.
The settlement amount has been paid out to the customer’s designated bank account for the vehicle repair coverage.
The claim case is now officially closed following successful settlement and payment processing, with no further action required.
All documents and correspondence related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
